text: Ili zhe govoryat: "On (t. ye. Mukhammad) izmyslil yego (t. ye. Koran)". Otvechay [, Mukhammad]: "Yesli ya izmyslil yego, vy niskol'ko ne zashchitite menya [za eto] pered Allakhom. On luchshe vsekh znayet to, o chem vy rasprostranyayetes'. Da budet yedinstvenno On svidetelem mezhdu mnoy i vami. On - proshchayushchiy, milostivyy
